name: POWER_XS_BAT_CHECK_PCORE_SCHED_DOMAIN_SERVER
summary: Verify if CPU topology sched_domain name are corrected detected and listed, on Pcore server SKU, SMT sched_domain is expected to be supported. MC: CPUs with the same LLC (L3) id also is expected to be supported.NUMA: if GNR/EMR support multiple package, NUMA is supported
